CustomField.formula:
Case(RecordType.Name,
"Coupon Transaction", if( Coupon_Group__c = "Cancellation or Customer Experience", "6151 - Coupon Expenses - Customers", "6150 - Coupon Expenses - Marketing" ),
"Sale Transaction", "2289 - Cancellation Clearing",
"1200 - Accounts Receivable" )
CustomField.label: Clearing Account
